title: Juniper Networks
extract: Juniper Networks, Inc. is an American multinational corporation headquartered in Sunnyvale, California, that develops and markets networking products. Its products include routers, switches, network management software, network security products and software-defined networking technology.
extract_html: Juniper Networks, Inc. is an American multinational corporation headquartered in Sunnyvale, California, that develops and markets networking products. Its products include routers, switches, network management software, network security products and software-defined networking technology.
